raw: Oil prices slip ahead of data pointers on impact of coronavirus on demand .
replaced: Oil prices slip ahead of data pointers on impact of coronavirus on demand .

raw: SINGAPORE ( Reuters ) - Oil prices edged lower on Monday as investors brace for economic data in Asia due this week that should give a reading on how China ’s coronavirus epidemic has affected oil demand .
replaced: SINGAPORE ( Reuters ) - Oil prices edged lower on Monday as investors brace for economic data in Asia due the weekend that should give a reading on how China ’s coronavirus epidemic has affected oil demand .

raw: A oil pump is seen at sunset outside Scheibenhard , near Strasbourg , France , October 6 , 2017 .
replaced: A oil pump is seen at sunset outside Scheibenhard , near Strasbourg , France , October 6 , 2017 .

raw: REUTERS / Christian Hartmann Brent crude LCOc1 was at $ 56.99 a barrel , down 33 cents by 0121 GMT after rising 5.2 % last week , the biggest weekly gain since September 2019 .
replaced: REUTERS / Christian Hartmann Brent crude LCOc1 was at $ 56.99 a barrel , down 33 cents by 0121 GMT after the biggest weekly gain since September 2019 5.2 % last week , the biggest weekly gain since September 2019 .

raw: U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude CLc1 fell 13 cents to $ 51.92 a barrel , after a 3.4 % gain last week .
replaced: U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude CLc1 fell 13 cents to $ 51.92 a barrel , after a 3.4 % gain last week .

raw: The weekly gains , the first since early January , were spurred by hopes that stimulus measures taken by China to support its economy amid the coronavirus outbreak could lead to a recovery in oil demand in the world ’s largest importing country .
replaced: The weekly gains , the first since early January , were spurred by hopes that stimulus measures taken by China to support China economy amid the epidemic could lead to a recovery in oil demand in the world ’s largest importing country .

raw: But the International Energy Agency ( IEA ) said the virus is already set to cause oil demand to fall by 435,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) in the first quarter from the same period a year ago , in what would be the first quarterly drop since the depths of the financial crisis in 2009 .
replaced: But the International Energy Agency ( IEA ) said U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude CLc1 is already set to cause oil demand to fall by 435,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) in the first quarter from the same period a year ago , in what would be the first quarterly drop since the depths of the financial crisis in 2009 .

raw: Analysts at Capital Economics said over the weekend that it is too soon to start assessing the longer - term economic fallout from the epidemic .
replaced: Analysts at Capital Economics said over the weekend that it is too soon to start assessing the longer - term economic fallout from the epidemic .

raw: “ Attention will be paid ( this week ) to the range of flash manufacturing PMIs ( purchasing managers ’ indices ) for February , particularly those in Asia , as these should provide an early indication of how significantly the virus is affecting global manufacturing supply chains , ” Capital Economics said .
replaced: “ Attention will be paid ( the weekend ) to the range of flash manufacturing PMIs ( purchasing managers ’ indices ) for February , particularly those in Asia , as the range of flash manufacturing PMIs ( purchasing managers ’ indices ) for February should provide an early indication of how significantly U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude CLc1 is affecting global manufacturing supply chains , ” Capital Economics said .

raw: “ We expect the data to be weak , but if they are better - than - expected then industrial commodity prices could see further gains . ”
replaced: “ Capital Economics expect the data to be weak , but if the data are better - than - expected then industrial commodity prices could see further gains . ”

raw: Investors are also anticipating that the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries ( OPEC ) and its allies , including Russia , will approve a proposal to deepen production cuts in a move to tighten global supplies and support oil prices .
replaced: Investors are also anticipating that The group , also known as OPEC+ , and The group , also known as OPEC+ , allies , including Russia , will approve a proposal to deepen production cuts in a move to tighten global supplies and support oil prices .

raw: The group , also known as OPEC+ , has an agreement to cut oil output by 2.1 million bpd until the end of March .
replaced: The group , also known as OPEC+ , has an agreement to cut oil output by 2.1 million bpd until the end of March .

raw: A technical committee has recommended the group reduces production by another 600,000 bpd because of the impact from the coronavirus on China ’s oil demand .
replaced: A technical committee has recommended The group , also known as OPEC+ , reduces production by another 600,000 bpd because of the impact from the coronavirus on China ’s oil demand .

raw: Russia , facing a growing oil glut , could support further output cuts .
